# rollup-cli

The CLI of rollup to generate template project.

### Installation

``` bash
$ npm install -g rollup-cli
```

### Usage

``` bash
$ rollup-cli <project-name>
```

### Feature

* tree shaking
* livereload browser
* closure compiler
* css module with postcss
* babel ES6
* starand eslint
* filesize analysis
